message.body: Hey there. I've got some work to take care of right now, but how about 2 or 2:30ish?
Hey that sounds good!
So, OK. Are u anywhere in the eastern US, on this ghastly heatwave we're having?
Hahah yeah NYC without a/c but luckily my basement apartment is kind of coolish... How about you?
Oh yeah. Philly, and I was in Beantown for the weekend and more.
So I've been [bracketing] you ;-)
Oh yeah my sister's in Boston she said its awful their her kittens are miserable
Oops there**
Poor kitties! Σ<•3X
My cat's unhappy w the weather. She's a calico tabby about 7 years old and very furry. And the big a/c that I used to have for the living room died in s
pring and I haven't replaced it, so she's just lying around looking glum.
Hahah aww poor kitty! My cat had been staying with my mom for a few weeks because I'm moving I miss him!
Oh yes, my poor Ista is lonely. When I'm home she hangs around me wherever I am. Sometimes it's "Feeeeeed me!", but even after that.
F'rex, she'll jump up on my desk & lie on the papers while I'm using the laptop. She used to lie at least partly on the keyboard - one end of her or the
other - till I started putting it on the tilting mini-easel.
Hahah aww cats love computers! Especially when we're using them, my cat will only sit on my lap when I'm using my laptop
nsitive) and flop down on my chest facing downhill. So I get a really closeup view of her least attractive part :-P . Of course this happens most often
Oh, when I'm leaning back in the big armchair, she'll jump up on the arm and walk across me (usu. stepping on my solar plexus or something even more se
Faceful.
when I'm sitting down to read or use the laptop, and I have to reach over or around her to see! I have a folder of webcam shots of this that I call Old
to put on my glasses or shove her forwards, b/c her dander in my eyes will trigger my allergies.
But I let her do it because she's lonely & furry, and I like her company. Except, if she's giving me the windshield wiper treatment with her tail I have
You available?
